metadata.title: Harley-Davidson Men's Custom Eagle Tonal Short Sleeve Crew-Neck Tee, Washed Gray
features: Extremely soft and light-weight, made from 50% polyester, 25% cotton and 25% rayon
Awesome distressed eagle screen printed graphic with a Bar & Shield logo
Wisconsin Harley-Davidson dealer name with Bar & Shield logo on back
description: Harley-Davidson Men's Eagle Short Sleeve Crew-Neck T-Shirt - Washed Gray, 30297804. Decked out with an awesome custom graphic, featuring an epic distressed eagle grasping an iconic Bar & Shield logo. Back features our Wisconsin Harley-Davidson Dealer logo. Classic style crew neck, traditional comfort fit. Soft high-quality, made from 50% polyester, 25% cotton and 25% rayon. This is sure to be a t-shirt that you'll wear time and time again. 30297804
